response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and add substantial value to your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I understand its worth to you is around $8,000. Considering its true market value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price not only ensures you get exceptional value for your investment but also allows us to maintain a fair and competitive market positioning. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 9500}
